net.jxse
Class JxseInstantiator

java.lang.Object
  net.jxse.JxseInstantiator

public class JxseInstantiator
extends Object

The purpose of this class is to provide a mechanism to load Class object instances from their fully qualified name, for later instantiation using reflexion.

It can be used to instantiate classes within API code without referring to implementation code.

Method Summary

Method Detail

forName

public static Class<?> forName(String fullyQualifiedClassName)
This method provides a Class object instance from the fully qualified name of a class.

Parameters:
fullyQualifiedClassName - The fully qualified name of the Class
Returns:
a Class instance or null if not available

instantiate

public static Object instantiate(Class inClass,
                                 Class[] inParamTypes,
                                 Object[] inParamValues)
This method instantiates an object from a Class. The constructor is fetched using provided array of parameter types and the class is instantiated with the provided array of parameter values.

The method logs a SEVERE record and returns null if an exception is encountered.

Parameters:
inClass - The Class to instantiate
inParamTypes - An array of parameter types
inParamValues - An array of parameter values
Returns:
an Object class or null

instantiate

public static Object instantiate(Class inClass,
                                 Object... inParametersValues)
This method instantiates an object from a Class. The constructor is fetched using provided parameters values.

The method logs a SEVERE record and returns null if an exception is encountered.

Parameters:
inClass - The Class to instantiate
inParametersValues - Any number of parameter values for the constructor
Returns:
an Object class or null

instantiateWithNoParameterConstructor

public static Object instantiateWithNoParameterConstructor(Class inClass)
This method instantiates an object from a Class using its no parameter constructor. The latter is fetched using reflexion.

The method logs a SEVERE record and returns null if an exception is encountered.

Parameters:
inClass - The Class to instantiate
Returns:
an Object class or null
